author: Vip3r
title: The Set to bring old and new generation of 24h LeMans together
review:
Being both Porsche and Lego enthusiast it's hard not to get emotional with this one.

The set could be good with just 919 but adding the legendary 917 is just overkill!

both cars look good, both are enjoyable to build and play with.

Minifigures are exclusive and diverse.

the pitlane/pitstop transforms into garage - for storage and additional playability, there is quite a lot of tools for minifigs added. really good set. 

on the cons - it's not a cheap set, and has a ton of stickers (but really they make a great effect!) - but in my opinion it is worth it!

best part is we got this with my 8y old son for Xmas - and had great time puting this together and playing afterwards. - really recommend this to any 24h LeMans fans
